changelogversion.changelogtext: [b]New![/b] You can now set preferred app for popular websites such as Youtube, Reddit, Play Store and so on
[b]New![/b] Added support for handling epub files, text files, location and email links
[b]New![/b] Added German, French, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, Catalan and Arabic translations
[b]New![/b] Automatically remembers last used app when no preferred app is set and pauses times when settings button is clicked
[b]Bug fix![/b] Fixed app crash which was occurring when opening Google+ links
[b]New![/b] You can now override timeout for filetypes
Minor other improvements and bug fixes
